alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Hancock; Marshall; Ohio; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:23AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF GUSTY SHOWERS WILL AFFECT MONROE...EASTERN HARRISON... JEFFERSON...COLUMBIANA...BELMONT...BEAVER...SOUTHERN MERCER... NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...LAWRENCE...OHIO...WESTERN WETZEL... MARSHALL...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 923 AM EST, radar indicated gusty showers were located along a cold front extending from near Vienna Center to 6 miles north of St. Marys. Movement was east at 35 mph. Wind gusts up to 45 mph are possible with these showers. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, New Castle, Weirton, Steubenville, Hermitage, Sharon, East Liverpool, Moundsville, Beaver Falls, Grove City, Martins Ferry, and Columbiana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 207 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 3. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 18. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 110 and 124. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 22. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 44. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
